248.question: How were the human judgements assembled?

11-Table2-1.png: The human judgements were assembled by having each annotator independently assign a score to each of the three tasks.</s>
The human judgements were assembled by having three annotators independently evaluate each task.</s>
12-Table3-1.png: The human judgements were assembled by asking annotators to rank the models from best to worst based on their performance on a set of test data.</s>
The human judgements were assembled by having annotators rank the models based on their performance.</s>

248.answer: 50 human annotators ranked a random sample of 100 translations by Adequacy, Fluency and overall ranking on a 5-point scale.
